description: This dashboard servers the purpose for monitoring  Jmeter executions.

targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count")  FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count")-sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ( "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") -sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("countError") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("success") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("count")-sum("countError")  AS "success" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))

SELECT sum("error") / sum("all") FROM (SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)), (SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))
SELECT mean("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("hit") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("maxAT") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'internal' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT max("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" = 'all' AND "application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("sb") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "transaction", time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "responseCode" !~ /^$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  "transaction","responseCode","responseMessage"

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("avg") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct50.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("pct90.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct95.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pct99.0") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("max") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("min") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ko') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("count") / $send_interval FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE ("transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "$measurement_name" WHERE "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" =~ /^$Transactions$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: Application
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "application"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'
list.name: Transactions
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY = "transaction" WHERE "application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "transaction" != 'internal' AND "transaction" != 'all'

title: ServiceReliabilityDashboard
